description: Returns the data available for the resource.

parameters.name: OrganizationId
parameters.description: The identifier associated with the organization for which the resource is described.

parameters.name: ResourceId
parameters.description: The identifier of the resource to be described. The identifier can accept ResourceId, Resourcename, or email. The following identity formats are available: Resource ID: r-0123456789a0123456789b0123456789 Email address: resource@domain.tld Resource name: resource.

nested_items.name: ResourceId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the described resource.

nested_items.name: Email
nested_items.description: The email of the described resource.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the described resource.

nested_items.name: Type
nested_items.description: The type of the described resource.

nested_items.name: BookingOptions
nested_items.description: The booking options for the described resource.

nested_items.name: AutoAcceptRequests
nested_items.description: The resource's ability to automatically reply to requests. If disabled, delegates must be associated to the resource.

nested_items.name: AutoDeclineRecurringRequests
nested_items.description: The resource's ability to automatically decline any recurring requests.

nested_items.name: AutoDeclineConflictingRequests
nested_items.description: The resource's ability to automatically decline any conflicting requests.

nested_items.name: State
nested_items.description: The state of the resource: enabled (registered to WorkMail), disabled (deregistered or never registered to WorkMail), or deleted.

nested_items.name: EnabledDate
nested_items.description: The date and time when a resource was enabled for WorkMail, in UNIX epoch time format.

nested_items.name: DisabledDate
nested_items.description: The date and time when a resource was disabled from WorkMail, in UNIX epoch time format.

nested_items.name: HiddenFromGlobalAddressList
nested_items.description: If enabled, the resource is hidden from the global address list.
